Victims for Victims, a victims' rights group that was founded by actress Theresa Saldana, protested against the verdict by staging a march outside the courthouse.[39] Afterward, several media outlets also debated the events of the trial and the verdict. Several outlets criticized Judge Katz's rulings, which many argued were preferential towards the defense. One local Los Angeles television station polled viewers who rated Judge Katz the fourth worst judge in Los Angeles County.[40]
